overview: Award winning director, William H., continues his new series, The Bombshells, with a second volume, featuring another 5 of the most beautiful and insatiable performers currently in porn. Starring the beautiful Sophia Santi in one of her first boy/girl scenes, alongside, out of contract, Katsuni with Sarah Vandella, Breanne Benson and Alexis Texas.
tagline: Starring Sophia Santi "yes she does boy/girl!",  with Katsuni "free at last!"
title: The Bombshells 2
